explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes an enterprise risk assessment model, which is a machine learning application.
explanations.deep learning: The model is based on graph attention networks, a type of deep learning architecture.
explanations.neural network: Graph attention networks are a form of neural networks used in the proposed model.
explanations.attention mechanism: The model utilizes an attention mechanism to focus on weights of associated enterprises and different relationships.
explanations.classification: The features are put into a classification network to determine the risk category of the target enterprise.
explanations.feature representation: The model involves feature aggregation, which is related to feature representation.
explanations.representation learning: The process of feature aggregation and attention mechanism can be seen as a form of representation learning.
